message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. Given its exceptional features and capabilities, we believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. We are offering this exclusive opportunity to acquire our product for $1200000. We understand that its true value may be subjective to your needs and expectations, but we are confident that this price reflects its unique benefits and potential impact on your endeavors.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to accept the current price. I am willing to pay up to $800000 for the product. I hope this revised offer aligns better with your expectations.
